page.title: 07MAGLEV
page.content: MAGLEV IS A JOINT DEVELOPMENT BY THE COUNTY COUNCIL,BRITISH RAIL AND INDUSTRY. USING A FRICTIONLESS MAGNETIC SUSPENSION,THE MAGLEV CARS WILL BE DRIVEN BY LINEAR INDUCTION AND MOTOR ALONG A GUIDEWAY TRACK ELEVATED OVER THE ROADS AND CAR PARKS. THE PURPOSE OF MAGLEV IS TO LINK,WITH EASY ACCESS,THE INTERNATIONAL AIRPORT WITH THE N.E.C. AND IT TAKES 90secs TO REACH ONE FROM THE OTHER AT A SPEED OF 30mph. MAGLEV STANDS FOR MAGNETIC LEVITATION. THE MAGLEV CAN HAVE FOUR PAIRS OF ELECTROMAGNETS.THE MAGNETS REACT WITH STEEL SUSPENTION WHICH THE RAILS ON EACH SIDE OF THE T SHAPED TRACK ALSO STEERS THE VEICHLE. THE CARS ARE CONTROLLED BY COMPUTER ACCORDING TO PASSENGER FLOW,BUT PASSENGERS CAN TALK BY RADIO IF NEEDS BE TO THE SYSTEMS CONTROLLER.
